ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Document_version_relationship is a relationship between Document_versions.
The description specifies additional information about the Document_version_relationship.
The related specifies the second of the two Document_versions related by the Document_version_relationship.
The related specifies the second of the two Document_versions related by the Document_version_relationship.
A Document_definition_relationship is a relationship between Document_definitions.
The description specifies additional information about the Document_definition_relationship.
The related specifies the first of the two Document_definition related by the Document_definition_relationship.
The related specifies the second of the two Document_definition related by the Document_definition_relationship.

A File_relationship is a relationship between two File objects. It specifies that the related File is referenced from the relating File. A service manual may contain graphics for explanatory reasons. In this case the File objects that contain the graphics are referenced as related from the File object that contains the body of the service manual with relation_type 'reference'.
The description specifies additional information about the File_relationship.
The related specifies the first of the two Files related by the File_relationship.
The related specifies the second of the two Files related by the File_relationship.
